nodes.text: Agent Fauler was a Human male member of the Republic Strategic Information Service during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, he was stationed on Tatooine and used N0-HX to contact a Republic-allied individual for their help. Fauler believed that the Czerka Corporation had a doomsday device, but they didn't build or test a device on the planet. The individual discovered that instead, they built their facility around an artifact that was soon discovered by the Republic.
